title.text: Forefront Threat Management Gateway (TMG) 2010 Service Pack 1

description.text:
This service pack contains the following improvements: 
* New Reports 
* Enhancements to URL Filtering 
* Enhanced Branch Office Support 
* SharePoint 2010 Support 
* Bug Fixes 

Details: 
New Reports 
* The User Activity report displays the sites and site categories accessed by any user. 
* All Forefront TMG reports have a new look. 

Enhancements to URL Filtering 
* You can now allow users to override the access restriction on sites blocked by URL filtering. 
* You can now override the categorization of a URL on the enterprise level; the override is effective for each enterprise-joined array. 
* Denial notification pages can now be customized. 

Enhanced Branch Office Support 
* Forefront TMG and a domain controller can now be collocated on the same server, which can help reduce the total cost of ownership at branch offices. 
* When installed on a computer running Windows Server 2008 R2, Forefront TMG can be configured as a BranchCache Hosted Cache server. 

SharePoint 2010 Support 
* Forefront TMG SP1 supports secure publishing of SharePoint 2010.
